you_did_not_invite_any_friends_yet: You did not invite any friends yet.
invite_your_friends_and_get_bonuses: Invite your friends and get bonuses
withdraw_to_tg_description: Withdraw your balance into Telegram Stars
withdraw_to_crypto_description: Convert your assets and withdraw to your wallet
withdraw_to_card_description: Get your balance transferred to your card
withdraw_notification:
At the moment, the withdrawal load is too high, so withdrawals may take up to 3 working days.

If the Telegram Stars have not been credited to your account within that time, please contact project support.
0_1_paid_completed: To complete the output — complete the task with a reward in Stars (0/1)
next_withdraw_paid: The next output will be available after completing the task with a reward in Stars.
vpn_notification: Make sure that the VPN is turned off. This is necessary for the correct operation of GetBonus.
referralProgramTitle: How does the referral program work?
whatIsUnverifiedVerified: What does Unverified and Verified mean?
unverifiedDescription: Unverified — an invited friend who has not yet completed any tasks with a Stars reward. They do not count towards the progress bar, but you immediately receive 1 dragon.
verifiedDescription: Verified — a friend who has completed at least one paid task. They count towards the progress bar and help you level up.
dragonReward: 1 dragon for each friend — whether Verified or Unverified.
levelBonuses: Level bonuses — tickets, coins, and more. Check the 'Gift' button next to the progress bar.
referralEarnings: Referral earnings — from level 7 onward, you receive a percentage of the Stars they earn. Example: if your friend earns 100 Stars, you receive 2 Stars.
